name: Bullet Heaven 3 [Prototype]
description:
Hey guys, here's a new shoot-em-up game made in Ruffle for the Flash Forward Game Jam on Newgrounds! I plan to someday make a much bigger version of this game, but for now, this version is a complete and polished package.

You've got a bunch of control schemes to choose from - I recommend the 3rd one, personally.  I strongly suggest playing on a PC with a mouse.

Oh, and you can press R to end a level instantly, and right-click to go into fullscreen mode!

Despite being a fairly quick project, there's quite a lot of content if you want to 100% it.

Sadly I had to re-use backgrounds and music from my other games, as there wasn't enough time to make new ones. :P
